divs: Sighting Detailslooking to the east i noticed a bright light in the night ski, it was big so i went and got my camcorder shot about 8 mims of film ill post the last 2 mims of it. all together it was in the area about 1 hour. i noticed that a plane came neer it and i couldn't zoom in on the plane but was able to get the object. that tells me it was closser than i though.
Summary: Looked like a bright star or planet then a streetlight.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Jefferson Hills
This sighting has never been favorited.
